item.title: AO Archive: Leveraging the Client-Server Boundary
item.description: https://spin.atomicobject.com/2017/11/07/restful-api-client-server/ This was one of the first blog posts I wrote while working at Atomic Object. I don’t think my views on the matter have changed much, especially the last section (“The Takeaways”).

item.title: AO Archive: The Error Handbook
item.description: https://spin.atomicobject.com/2020/05/11/categorize-software-errors/ https://spin.atomicobject.com/2020/05/12/capturing-representing-errors/ https://spin.atomicobject.com/2020/05/13/error-handling-process/ This is a 3-part blog series I wrote while working at Atomic Object. I spent quite a bit of time writing it, and I’m not entirely satisfied with the way it turned out. Error handling really is a complicated and important part of programming, and it’s hard to get it right a lot of the time. I’ll almost definitely be expanding on these ideas in future blog posts.
